sql.if: where title LIKE CONCAT('%', #{keyword}, '%') OR content LIKE CONCAT('%', #{keyword}, '%')

mapper.insert: INSERT INTO spring_boards (title, content, writer, writeDate) VALUES ( #{title}, #{content}, #{writer}, NOW() )
mapper.select:
SELECT id, title, writer, writeDate FROM spring_boards
ORDER BY id DESC LIMIT #{pageStart}, #{perPageNum}
mapper.update: UPDATE spring_boards SET content = #{content}, title = #{title} WHERE id = #{id}
mapper.select: SELECT b.*, u.name, u.img, u.level FROM spring_boards AS b, spring_users AS u WHERE id = #{id} AND u.userid = b.writer
